description: Structured information describing the terminology used in a brain atlas.

alias._instruction: Enter an user-defined identifier, often a short name, of this atlas terminology.

anatomicalEntities._instruction: Add anatomical entities (term(s)) that are part of this atlas terminology.

definedIn._instruction: Add the file(s) in which this atlas terminology is defined in.

fullName._instruction: Enter a descriptive name of this atlas terminology.

relatedOntology._instruction: Enter the identifier (IRI) of the related ontological term that best describes this atlas terminology.
